ldns: Fast DNS library supporting recent RFCs
less: A terminal based program for viewing text files
libaio: The Linux-native asynchronous I/O facility (aio) library
libarchive: library that can create and read several streaming archive formats
libassuan: IPC library used by some GnuPG related software
libedit: Command line editor library providing generic line editing, history, and tokenization functions
libelf: Libraries to handle ELF object files and DWARF debugging information
libgcrypt: General purpose cryptographic library based on the code from GnuPG
libgssglue: Exports a gssapi interface which calls other random gssapi libraries
libidn: Implementation of the Stringprep, Punycode and IDNA specifications
libidn2: Free software implementation of IDNA2008, Punycode and TR46
libksba: A CMS and X.509 access library
libldap: Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (LDAP) client libraries
libmnl: Minimalistic user-space library oriented to Netlink developers.
libmpc: Library for the arithmetic of complex numbers with arbitrarily high precision
libnftnl: Netfilter library providing interface to the nf_tables subsystem
libnghttp2: Framing layer of HTTP/2 is implemented as a reusable C library
libnl: Library for applications dealing with netlink sockets
libpcap: A system-independent interface for user-level packet capture
libpipeline: a C library for manipulating pipelines of subprocesses in a flexible and convenient way
libsasl: Cyrus Simple Authentication Service Layer (SASL) Library
libsecret: Library for storing and retrieving passwords and other secrets
libssh2: A library implementing the SSH2 protocol as defined by Internet Drafts
libtasn1: The ASN.1 library used in GNUTLS
libunistring: Library for manipulating Unicode strings and C strings
libusb: Library that provides generic access to USB devices
links: A text WWW browser, similar to Lynx
linux-api-headers: Kernel headers sanitized for use in userspace
linux-atm: Drivers and tools to support ATM networking under Linux.
linux-docs: Kernel hackers manual - HTML documentation that comes with the Linux kernel
linux-headers: Header files and scripts for building modules for Linux kernel
linux-lts-docs: Kernel hackers manual - HTML documentation that comes with the Linux-lts kernel
linux-lts-headers: Header files and scripts for building modules for Linux-lts kernel
lablgtk2: An Objective Caml interface to gtk2
ladspa: Linux Audio Developer's Simple Plugin API (LADSPA)
lame: A high quality MPEG Audio Layer III (MP3) encoder
latex2html: a convertor written in Perl that converts LaTeX documents to HTML.
ldb: A schema-less, ldap like, API and database
lensfun: Database of photographic lenses and a library that allows advanced access to the database
leveldb: A fast and lightweight key/value database library
lftp: Sophisticated command line based FTP client
libabw: a library that parses the file format of AbiWord documents
libaccounts-glib: Glib-based client library for accessing the online accounts database
libaccounts-qt: Qt-based client library for accessing the online accounts database
libao: Cross-platform audio output library and plugins
libass: A portable library for SSA/ASS subtitles rendering
libasyncns: A C library for executing name service queries asynchronously
libatasmart: ATA S.M.A.R.T. Reading and Parsing Library
libatomic_ops: Provides semi-portable access to hardware provided atomic memory operations
libavc1394: A library to control A/V devices using the 1394ta AV/C commands.
libblockdev: A library for manipulating block devices
libbluray: Library to access Blu-Ray disks for video playback
libbsd: Provides useful functions commonly found on BSD systems like strlcpy()
libburn: Library for reading, mastering and writing optical discs
libbytesize: A tiny library providing a C "class" for working with arbitrary big sizes in bytes
libcacard: (Common Access Card) library thar provides emulation of smart cards to a virtual card reader running in a guest virtual machine
libcanberra: A small and lightweight implementation of the XDG Sound Theme Specification
libcap-ng: A library making programming with POSIX capabilities easier than traditional libcap
libcdaudio: Library for controlling Audio CDs and interacting with CDDB
libcddb: Library that implements the different protocols (CDDBP, HTTP, SMTP) to access data on a CDDB server (e.g. http://freedb.org).
libcdio: GNU Compact Disc Input and Control Library
libcdr: CorelDraw file format importer library for LibreOffice
libclc: Library requirements of the OpenCL C programming language
libcloudproviders: DBus API that allows cloud storage sync clients to expose their services
libcmis: a C/C++ client library for the CMIS protocol
libcue: Parses so-called cue sheets and handles the parsed data
libcups: The CUPS Printing System - client libraries and headers
libdaemon: Lightweight C library that eases the writing of UNIX daemons
libdatrie: Implementation of double-array structure for representing trie, as proposed by Junichi Aoe.
libdazzle: A library to delight your users with fancy features
libdbusmenu-qt4: A library that provides a Qt4 implementation of the DBusMenu spec
libdbusmenu-qt5: A library that provides a Qt implementation of the DBusMenu spec
libdc1394: High level programming interface to control IEEE 1394 based cameras
libdca: Free library for decoding DTS Coherent Acoustics streams
libdiscid: A Library for creating MusicBrainz DiscIDs
libdmapsharing: A library that implements the DMAP family of protocols
libdmtx: A software for reading and writing Data Matrix 2D barcodes
libdrm: Userspace interface to kernel DRM services
libdv: The Quasar DV codec (libdv) is a software codec for DV video
libdvbpsi: A library designed for decoding and generation of MPEG TS and DVB PSI tables
libdvdcss: Portable abstraction library for DVD decryption
libdvdread: Provides a simple foundation for reading DVD video disks
libe-book: Library for import of reflowable e-book formats.
libebur128: A library that implements the EBU R 128 standard for loudness normalisation.
libepoxy: Library handling OpenGL function pointer management
libetonyek: Library and a set of tools for reading and converting Apple Keynote presentations
libetpan: A portable middleware for email access
libexif: A library to parse an EXIF file and read the data from those tags
libexttextcat: N-Gram-Based Text Categorization library primarily intended for language guessing
libfreehand: a library for import of Aldus/Macromedia/Adobe FreeHand documents
libgadu: This library implements the client side of the Gadu-Gadu protocol
libgdata: GLib-based library for accessing online service APIs using the GData protocol
libgdiplus: Open Source Implementation of the GDI+ API
libgee: A collection library providing GObject-based interfaces and classes for commonly used data structures
libgepub: Simple library to read epub files using glib
libglade: Allows you to load glade interface files in a program at runtime
libgme: Video game music file emulation/playback library
libgphoto2: The core library of gphoto2, designed to allow access to digital camera by external programs.
libgpod: A shared library to access the contents of an iPod
libgravatar: KDE PIM library providing Gravatar support
libgrss: Glib-based library to manage RSS and Atom feeds
libgsf: An extensible I/O abstraction library for dealing with structured file formats
libgsystem: "Copylib" for system service modules using GLib with GCC
libgtop: A library that reads information about processes and the running system
libgweather: Location and timezone database and weather-lookup library
libhttpseverywhere: Leverage the power of HTTPS Everywhere
libical: An open source reference implementation of the icalendar data type and serialization format
libidl2: A front-end for CORBA 2.2 IDL and Netscape's XPIDL
libiec61883: A higher level API for streaming DV, MPEG-2 and audio over Linux IEEE 1394
libieee1284: A library to query devices connected in parallel port
libifp: General-purpose library-driver for iRiver's iFP portable audio players
libimobiledevice: Library that talks the protocols to support iPhone and iPod Touch devices on Linux
libinput: Input device management and event handling library
libiscsi: Clientside library to implement the iSCSI protocol
libisoburn: frontend for libraries libburn and libisofs
libisofs: Library to pack up hard disk files and directories into a ISO 9660 disk image
libixion: A general purpose formula parser & interpreter
libjpeg-turbo: JPEG image codec with accelerated baseline compression and decompression
libkate: A karaoke and text codec for embedding in ogg
libkcompactdisc: A library for interfacing with CDs
libkdcraw: A C++ interface used to decode RAW picture
libkdegames: Common code and data for many KDE games
libkeduvocdocument: Common libraries for KDE Edu applications
libkexiv2: A library to manipulate pictures metadata
libkeybinder3: A library for registering global keyboard shortcuts
libkgapi: A KDE-based library for accessing various Google services via their public API
libkgeomap: A wrapper around world map components for browsing and arranging photos on a map
libkipi: An interface to use kipi-plugins from a KDE application
libkmahjongg: Common code, backgrounds and tile sets for games using Mahjongg tiles
libkolabxml: Kolab XML Format Schema Definitions Library
libkomparediff2: Library to compare files and strings
libksieve: KDE PIM library for managing sieves
libkvkontakte: C++ library for asynchronous interaction with VK social network via its web API
liblangtag: interface library to access/deal with tags for identifying languages
liblastfm: A Qt4 C++ library for the Last.fm webservices
liblo: A lightweight OSC (Open Sound Control) implementation
liblqr: A seam-carving C/C++ library called Liquid Rescale
liblrdf: A library for the manipulation of RDF file in LADSPA plugins
libmcrypt: A library which provides a uniform interface to several symmetric encryption algorithms
libmediaart: Library tasked with managing, extracting and handling media art caches
libmediawiki: A KDE C++ interface for MediaWiki based web service as wikipedia.org
libmilter: Implementation of the sendmail Mail Filter API
libmng: A collection of routines used to create and manipulate MNG format graphics files
libmp3splt: Library for splitting mp3 and ogg files without decoding
libmpdclient: Asynchronous API library for interfacing MPD in the C, C++ & Objective C languages
libmpeg2: Library for decoding MPEG-1 and MPEG-2 video streams.
libmspack: A library for Microsoft compression formats
libmspub: Microsoft Publisher file format parser library (latest snapshot)
libmtp: Library implementation of the Media Transfer Protocol
libmusicbrainz5: Library That Provides Access to the MusicBrainz Server
libmwaw: Import library for some old mac text documents.
libmygpo-qt: A C++/Qt client library for gpodder.net
libnautilus-extension: Library for extending the Default file manager for GNOME
libnet: A library which provides API for commonly used low-level net functions
libnetfilter_acct: Library providing interface to extended accounting infrastructure
libnetfilter_conntrack: Library providing an API to the in-kernel connection tracking state table
libnetfilter_cthelper: Library for the connection tracking helper infrastructure
libnetfilter_cttimeout: Library for the connection tracking timeout infrastructure
libnetfilter_log: Library providing API to packets that have been logged by netfilter
libnetfilter_queue: Userspace API to packets that have been queued by the kernel packet filter
libnfnetlink: Low-level library for netfilter related kernel/userspace communication
libnice: An implementation of the IETF's draft ICE (for p2p UDP data streams)
libnova: A general purpose, double precision, celestial mechanics, astrometry and astrodynamics library.
liboauth: C library implementing OAuth Core RFC 5849
libodfgen: Library for generating documents in Open Document Format
libofa: An open-source audio fingerprint by MusicIP
libomxil-bellagio: An opensource implementation of the OpenMAX Integration Layer API
liborcus: File import filter library for spreadsheet documents.
liborigin2: A library for reading OriginLab OPJ project files
liborigin2-docs: Documentation for liborigin2: a library for reading OriginLab OPJ project files
libpagemaker: a library that parses the file format of Aldus/Adobe PageMaker documents
libpano13: Basic library to calculate panoramical pictures - core functions of the panotools
libpgf: An implementation of the Progressive Graphics File (PGF)
libphonenumber: Google's common library for parsing, formatting, and validating international phone numbers
libplist: A library to handle Apple Property List format whereas it's binary or XML
libpng: A collection of routines used to create PNG format graphics files
libproxy: A library that provides automatic proxy configuration management
libpulse: A featureful, general-purpose sound server (client library)
libpwquality: Library for password quality checking and generating random passwords
libqaccessibilityclient: Helper library to make writing accessibility tools easier
libquvi: Library for parsing video download links.
libquvi-scripts: Library for parsing video download links.
libqxp: a library that parses the file format of QuarkXPress documents
libraqm: A library that encapsulates the logic for complex text layout
libraw: A library for reading RAW files obtained from digital photo cameras (CRW/CR2, NEF, RAF, DNG, and others)
libraw1394: Provides an API to the Linux IEEE1394 (FireWire) driver

libsamplerate: Secret Rabbit Code - aka Sample Rate Converter for audio
libshout: Library for accessing a shoutcast/icecast server
libsidplay: A library for playing SID music files.
libsidplayfp: Library to play Commodore 64 music derived from libsidplay2
libsigc++: Libsigc++ implements a full callback system for use in widget libraries - V2

libsmbios: A library for providing access to as much BIOS information as possible

libsoxr: The SoX Resampler library that aims to give fast and high quality results for any constant resampling ratio

libspeechd: High-level device independent layer for speech synthesis interface
libspiro: Simplifies the drawing of beautiful curves
libspnav: Alternative to the proprietary 3Dconnexion device driver and SDK for their 3D input devices
